ya3.1.2:2.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṃ. Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:5.1: Dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ sotaṃ, na sotāyatanaṃ. Sotāyatanaṃ sotañceva sotāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:12.1: Kāyāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso kāyo, na kāyāyatanaṃ. Kāyāyatanaṃ kāyo ceva kāyāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:15.1: Rūpāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ rūpaṃ, na rūpāyatanaṃ. Rūpāyatanaṃ rūpañceva rūpāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:20.1: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho gandho, na gandhāyatanaṃ. Gandhāyatanaṃ gandho ceva gandhāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:23.1: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso raso, na rasāyatanaṃ. Rasāyatanaṃ raso ceva rasāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:30.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṃ. Dhammāyatanaṃ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:34.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu na cakkhāyatanaṃ, cakkhu. Cakkhuñca cakkhāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva cakkhu na ca cakkhāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:37.1: Dibbasotaṃ taṇhāsotaṃ na sotāyatanaṃ, sotaṃ. Sotañca sotāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva sotaṃ na ca sotāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:44.1: Kāyāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso na kāyāyatanaṃ, kāyo. Kāyañca kāyāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva kāyo na ca kāyāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:47.1: Rūpāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na rūpāyatanaṃ, rūpaṃ. Rūpañca rūpāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva rūpaṃ na ca rūpāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:52.1: Sīlagandho samādhigandho paññāgandho na gandhāyatanaṃ, gandho. Gandhañca gandhāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva gandho na ca gandhāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:55.1: Attharaso dhammaraso vimuttiraso na rasāyatanaṃ, raso. Rasañca rasāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva raso na ca rasāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:62.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso na dhammāyatanaṃ, dhammo. Dhammañca dhammāyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesaṃ na ceva dhammo na ca dhammāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:64.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṃ. Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:66.1: Sotāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva sotāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na sotāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:68.1: Dibbacakkhu paññācakkhu cakkhu, na cakkhāyatanaṃ. Cakkhāyatanaṃ cakkhu ceva cakkhāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:70.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva dhammāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:71.1: » Sotaṃ sotāyatananti? …pe… Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṃ …pe….
ya3.1.2:73.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṃ. Dhammāyatanaṃ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:75.1: Cakkhāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva cakkhāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na cakkhāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:77.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ ṭhapetvā avaseso dhammo, na dhammāyatanaṃ. Dhammāyatanaṃ dhammo ceva dhammāyatanañca.
ya3.1.2:79.1: Manāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva manāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na manāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:87.1: « Nāyatanā na cakkhāyatanaṃ …pe… nāyatanā na dhammāyatananti? Āmantā.
ya3.1.2:94.1: « Nāyatanā na sotāyatanaṃ …pe… nāyatanā na manāyatananti? Āmantā. (12)
ya3.1.2:98.1: Cakkhāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva cakkhāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na cakkhāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:100.1: Āmantā …pe… ghānaṃ … jivhā … kāyo … rūpaṃ … saddo … gandho … raso … phoṭṭhabbo … mano …
ya3.1.2:103.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva dhammāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:105.1: Cakkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na cakkhu, āyatanā. Cakkhuñca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:108.1: Sotaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… ghānaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… jivhaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:113.1: Rūpaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… saddaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… gandhaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… rasaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… phoṭṭhabbaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:116.1: Manaṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na mano, āyatanā. Manañca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva mano na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:122.1: Sotāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva sotāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na sotāyatanaṃ.
ya3.1.2:125.1: Dhammāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva dhammāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na dhammāyatanaṃ. (1)
ya3.1.2:127.1: « Āyatanā cakkhāyatananti? …pe… Na cakkhāyatanaṃ …pe…. Āyatanā dhammāyatananti? …pe… Na dhammāyatanaṃ. (2)
ya3.1.2:129.1: « Āyatanā cakkhāyatananti? …pe… Āyatanā dhammāyatananti? …pe… Na dhammāyatanaṃ …pe…. (3–11)
ya3.1.2:132.1: Manāyatanaṃ āyatanañceva manāyatanañca. Avasesā āyatanā na manāyatanaṃ. (12)
ya3.1.2:135.1: Cakkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na cakkhu, āyatanā. Cakkhuñca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:138.1: Cakkhuṃ ṭhapetvā avasesā āyatanā na cakkhu, āyatanā. Cakkhuñca āyatanañca ṭhapetvā avasesā na ceva cakkhu na ca āyatanā.
ya3.1.2:139.1: « Nāyatanā na ghānāyatanaṃ …pe… nāyatanā na dhammāyatananti? Āmantā. (1)
ya3.1.2:141.1: Sotaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… ghānaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… jivhaṃ ṭhapetvā …pe… na ca āyatanā. (2–3)
ya3.1.2:144.1: « Nāyatanā na cakkhāyatananti? Āmantā. …pe…. Nāyatanā na dhammāyatananti? Āmantā. …pe…. (5–11)
